parameters.title: MarineWeatherParams
parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`marine_weather`]

days.description: Number of days of weather forecast. Value ranges from 1 to 7

dt.description: Date should be between today and next 7 day in yyyy-MM-dd format. e.g. '2023-05-20'

hour.description: Must be in 24 hour. For example 5 pm should be hour=17, 6 am as hour=6

lang.description:
Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language.
Visit [request parameter section](https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/#intro-request) to check 'lang-code'.

q.description: Pass Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) which is on a sea/ocean. Visit [request parameter section](https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/#intro-request) to learn more.

unixdt.description: Please either pass 'dt' or 'unixdt' and not both in same request. unixdt should be between today and next 7 day in Unix format. e.g. 1490227200
